definition.name: Dialog
definition.purpose: Provides a root dialog component for displaying modal dialogs.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Root, used to create modal dialogs. It passes all props to the underlying primitive and adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

effects: Dialog content is rendered and visible to the user.

when.description: Dialog is closed by user action or programmatically.

effects: Dialog content is removed from the DOM.

definition.visualLayout: No visual layout by itself; acts as a container for dialog content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Root. Use with DialogTrigger, DialogContent, etc. for full dialog functionality.

definition.name: DialogTrigger
definition.purpose: Provides a trigger element to open the dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Trigger, used to open the dialog when interacted with. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

when.description: User interacts with the trigger (e.g., clicks).

effects: Dialog opens and content is displayed.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Trigger. Use inside Dialog.

definition.name: DialogPortal
definition.purpose: Renders dialog content in a React portal.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Portal, used to render dialog content outside the DOM hierarchy of the parent component. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

initial.data: Portal is not rendered until dialog is open.

effects: Dialog content is rendered in a portal.

definition.visualLayout: No layout; acts as a container for dialog content.

definition.name: DialogClose
definition.purpose: Provides a button or element to close the dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Close, used to close the dialog when interacted with. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

when.description: User interacts with the close element.

effects: Dialog closes and content is removed.

definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Close. Use inside DialogContent.

definition.name: DialogOverlay
definition.purpose: Renders a semi-transparent overlay behind the dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Overlay, providing a styled overlay with fade and animation effects. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the overlay.

initial.data: Overlay is not visible until dialog is open.

effects: Overlay is rendered with fade-in animation.
Overlay is removed with fade-out animation.

definition.visualLayout: Covers the entire viewport behind the dialog content.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Overlay. Uses cn utility for className merging.

definition.name: DialogContent
definition.purpose: Renders the main content of the dialog, including children and a close button.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Content, providing a styled modal content area. Includes a close button with an X icon and uses DialogPortal and DialogOverlay for proper layering.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the content.

children.description: Content to display inside the dialog.

initial.data: Dialog content is not rendered until dialog is open.

effects: Dialog content is rendered in a portal with overlay and close button.
Dialog closes and content is removed.

definition.visualLayout: Centered modal with padding, rounded corners, and a close button in the top-right corner.
definition.implementationNotes: Uses DialogPortal, DialogOverlay, and DialogPrimitive.Content. Includes a styled close button with XIcon.

definition.name: DialogHeader
definition.purpose: Renders a header section for the dialog.
definition.description: A styled div for the dialog header, typically used to display the dialog title or introductory content. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the header.

initial.data: Header is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.visualLayout: Flex column, gap between elements, centered or left-aligned text.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled div using cn utility. Use inside DialogContent.

definition.name: DialogFooter
definition.purpose: Renders a footer section for the dialog, typically for actions.
definition.description: A styled div for the dialog footer, usually containing action buttons. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the footer.

initial.data: Footer is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.visualLayout: Flex row (on small screens, column-reverse), gap between elements, right-aligned on larger screens.
definition.implementationNotes: Styled div using cn utility. Use inside DialogContent.

definition.name: DialogTitle
definition.purpose: Renders the title of the dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Title, styled for use as the dialog's main heading. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the title.

initial.data: Title is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.visualLayout: Large, bold text for the dialog heading.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Title. Use inside DialogHeader.

definition.name: DialogDescription
definition.purpose: Renders a description or supporting text for the dialog.
definition.description: A wrapper around Radix UI's DialogPrimitive.Description, styled for use as supporting text in the dialog. Adds a data-slot for styling or testing.

className.description: Additional CSS classes for the description.

initial.data: Description is rendered as part of dialog content.

definition.visualLayout: Smaller, muted text for additional dialog information.
definition.implementationNotes: Wraps Radix UI DialogPrimitive.Description. Use inside DialogHeader or DialogContent.
